```{r Merge SMARTIE and Checklist}
temp <- SMARTIE
temp$gbifapi_acceptedScientificName <- temp$gbifapi_scientificName
temp$gbifapi_scientificName <- NULL
SMARTIE2 <- merge(x= temp, y = aggregated_checklist, all.X = T)
```
